data.title: Airport Shuttle and Transportation
data.meta_description: Limousine Services, Airport Shuttle Busses, Charter Services and Tours by Lafayette Limo. Located in West Lafayette, IN.
data.text:
Indianapolis Airport Shuttle Services

Bus Shuttles to and from Indianapolis International Airport and Greater Lafayette Area

Free your time to work, read, or relax by taking Greater Lafayette and West Lafayetteâ€™s most dependable Airport Shuttle Service to the Indianapolis International Airport. Running 9 times a day, 7 days a week, from 5 conveniently located local depots, our Airport Shuttle has been saving thousands of our clientele from the headache of the ever increasing costs of on-site parking and fuel expenses. Whether you prefer to reserve your seat and pre-pay online through our website or call our office to reserve and pay when you board, reservations have never been easier to make! Let our experienced Booking Agents and fully-licensed drivers do the hard work while you arrive relaxed and ready for your flight! Now offering free WIFI on every shuttle. Click here to view Indianapolis International Airport Shuttle pick-up and drop-off locations and hours of operation!

Lafayette Limo recommends arriving to the Indianapolis International Airport at least 90 minutes before your flight departs. (During peak travel season including holidays and Purdue breaks we recommend arrival 120 minutes prior to flight departure.) Lafayette Limo, Inc is not responsible for delays resulting in missed or rescheduled flights. Recommendations are subject to change. Please contact Lafayette Limo Office and speak to an agent about any questions or concerns. If you wish to change your reservation it must be done 24 hours in advance of your trip. Please do not wait until the day of. Please either call the office (765-497-3828) or email us. If you cancel your trip and re-book we have a no refund policy and can only postpone the canceled ticket for 90 days as a credit.

Convenient Year-Round Service

Our convenient shuttles run year round from Lafayette to the Indianapolis airport every two hours, nine times a day from 4:30 a.m. to 8:30 p.m. Our first pick up from the Indianapolis airport is at 6:30 a.m., the last at 10:30 p.m.

Please call direct to each location to request parking information. This is due to limited parking, inability to park and limitations for how long you can leave your vehicle.

Lafayette to Indianapolis Airport Schedule

Make Reservations

*See Fare Information and Terms Below

L-A1 L-A2 L-A3 L-A4 L-A5 L-A6 L-A7 L-A8 L-A9 Leave Lafayette Limo Office 4:30 AM 6:30 AM 8:30 AM 10:30 AM 12:30 PM 2:30 PM 4:30 PM 6:30 PM 8:30 PM Quality Inn (Formerly Four Points) 4:35 AM 6:35 AM 8:35 AM 10:35 AM 12:35 PM 2:35 PM 4:35 PM 6:35 PM 8:35 PM Purdue West 4:45 AM 6:45 AM 8:45 AM 10:45 AM 12:45 PM 2:45 PM 4:45 PM 6:45 PM 8:45 PM State Street Bus Stop (South of PMU) 4:55 AM 6:55 AM 8:55 AM 10:55 AM 12:55 PM 2:55 PM 4:55 PM 6:55 PM 8:55 PM Holiday Inn City Centre 5:05 AM 7:05 AM 9:05 AM 11:05 AM 1:05 PM 3:05 PM 5:05 PM 7:05 PM 9:05 PM Courtyard Marriott Lafayette 5:20 AM 7:20 AM 9:20 AM 11:20 AM 1:20 PM 3:20 PM 5:20 PM 7:20 PM 9:20 PM Arrive Indianapolis Airport 6:30 AM 8:30 AM 10:30 AM 12:30 PM 2:30 PM 4:30 PM 6:30 PM 8:30 PM 10:30 PM

Lafayette Pick-Up Map

Our boarding location for each stop is as follows:

Quality Inn pick up is at the side hotel lobby entrance.

Purdue West is pick up on the curbside facing McCutcheon Hall.

State Street Bus Stop (South of PMU) Pick up is at the bus stop on State Street on the south end of the Purdue Memorial Union Building.

Holiday Inn City Centre pick up is at the hotel lobby. Please check in at the front desk.

Courtyard by Marriott pick up is in front of the hotel lobby.

Please make sure to check inside at all locations or call ahead to our office to confirm you are in the correct boarding locations.

Indianapolis Airport to Lafayette Schedule

Make Reservations

*See Fare Information and Terms Below

A-L1 A-L2 A-L3 A-L4 A-L5 A-L6 A-L7 A-L8 A-L9 Leave Indianapolis Airport 6:30 AM 8:30 AM 10:30 AM 12:30 PM 2:30 PM 4:30 PM 6:30 PM 8:30 PM 10:30 PM Arrive Courtyard Marriott Lafayette 7:40AM 9:40AM 11:40 AM 1:40 PM 3:40 PM 5:40 PM 7:40 PM 9:40 PM 11:40 PM Holiday Inn City Centre 7:55AM 9:55AM 11:55 AM 1:55 PM 3:55 PM 5:55 PM 7:55 PM 9:55 PM 11:55 PM State Street Bus Stop (South of PMU) 8:00AM 10:00AM 12:00 PM 2:00 PM 4:00 PM 6:00 PM 8:00 PM 10:00 PM 12:00 AM Purdue West 8:10AM 10:10AM 12:10 PM 2:10PM 4:10 PM 6:10 PM 8:10 PM 10:10 PM 12:10 AM Quality Inn (Formerly Four Points) 8:20AM 10:20AM 12:20 PM 2:20 PM 4:20 PM 6:20 PM 8:20 PM 10:20 PM 12:20 AM Lafayette Limo Office 8:30AM 10:30AM 12:30 PM 2:30 PM 4:30 PM 6:30 PM 8:30 PM 10:30 PM 12:30 AM

Airport Information

All Passengers must meet the driver at the shuttle due to increased airport security.

Airline Employees receive a discount from the driver or if you create an online account we can apply the discount by calling us.

To better service our customers we have an employee at our booth to sell tickets and check in passengers who have already purchased tickets. Please check in at our booth, across from Avis Rental Car, to make our service run as smoothly as possible.

Lafayette Drop-Off Map

Our drop-off location for each stop is as follows:

Quality Inn drop-off is at the side hotel lobby entrance.

Purdue West drop-off is on the curbside facing McCutcheon Hall.

State Street Bus Stop (South of PMU) Pick up is at the bus stop on State Street on the south end of the Purdue Memorial Union Building.

Holiday Inn City Centre drop-off is on the back side facing Alabama.

Courtyard by Marriott drop-off is in front of the hotel lobby.

Fare Information

No matter who you are, Lafayette Limo has a price that fits your budget. Children 2 and under are free of charge. Children 3-12 travel at half price. Current airline employees with ID or current check stub may travel half price with an active account on our purchase ticket site or by paying in person. *Special pricing* *For the Indy line run it's $25 one way and $45 round trip and the O'Hare share a ride $55 one way and $110 round trip when booking 24 hours in advance online.* The prices listed below are when paying in person. The online prices are listed in the reservation page. All online reservations need to be made 24 hours in advance.

PETS and BICYCLES are full adult fare. Service animals ride for free. A same day round trip ticket is $27 but cannot be booked online. Pets, with the exception of service animals, must be in carriers.

There is no need to worry about airport parking or the weather - Lafayette Limo drops you off at the ground transportation center. So sit back, relax and enjoy the ride.

Type One Way Round Trip Adult (in person) $27.00 $50.00 Child (3-12 years old) $14.00 $25.00 Child (2 and under) free when sitting on parents lap FREE FREE Commuter (same day roundtrip) Purchase is only available through the driver N/A $27.00 Airline Employees (with current pay stub or ID)

14.00 $25.00

Fare Terms

To pay your fare at the airport, please visit the Lafayette Limo booth across from Avis Rent-a-Car which is located in the ground transportation center.

Paid fares are nonrefundable.

At Lafayette Limo office:

Cash

Travelers Checks

Credit Cards

We don't accept personal checks

Online paid reservations:

All online reservations must be made 24 hours in advance.

This pertains to Indianapolis and O'Hare airports.

O'Hare reservations must be made online, This is a pre-paid 24 hours in advance service.

If you fail to make a reservation 24 hours in advance, service is not guaranteed for O'Hare.

If you miss the 24 hour deadline for the Indianapolis airport you can call the office book your reservation then pay the driver in cash, or at the airport you can pay cash or use a credit card at our booth only.

We don't take any payments over the phone.

Have your picture ID to show the driver

You MUST allow at least 90 to 120 minutes before your scheduled flight. Allow even more time during our busy times which includes all holidays, and spring break time.

We are NOT liable for missed flights.

We are NOT responsible for more than the shuttle ticket purchase price.

All tickets are NON-REFUNDABLE

Luggage Limitations:

One suitcase with one carry-on per person: No Charge

Each additional bag: $10.00

Pets: Full Fare (Must be in a pet carrier). No charge for service animals.

Bicycles: Full Fare

ALL passengers must have shoes, shirts and modest appropriate attire

At Bus Pick Up Sites:

Cash

Travelers Checks

No Credit Cards or personal checks please.

All fares are subject to change without notice.

Contact Us for details.

Special Requests

Handicapped Accessible. Lafayette Limo is happy to accommodate customers requiring handicapped accessible transportation. We will need 48 hour advance notice to make these arrangements.

10 Minute Hold
